ABOUTME.TITLE: Hi, I am a German-Turkish frontend developer near Nuremberg with a passion for IT and creative design.
ABOUTME.FLEX: I am flexible and happy to work both in the office and remotely.
ABOUTME.MIND: I am open to new experiences and excited to take on challenging opportunities.
ABOUTME.CHECK: For me, programming is not just about writing lines of code but about creating innovative solutions that inspire.
ABOUTME.FOCUS: I value clean code, user-focused designs, and efficient implementation.

SKILLSET.TITLE: Technologies
SKILLSET.INFO: Throughout my journey, I have worked on diverse projects, utilizing a wide range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am always eager to embrace new tools and methodologies, continuously improving my skills to stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of web development.
SKILLSET.MORE: Feel free to reach out. I’m always excited to broaden my expertise and take on new challenges.

POPUP.INFO: I have a special interest in learning.

PROJECTS.INFO: Explore a selection of my work here — interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.INFO: A task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functionality, and assign users and categories.

NIGHTSTALKER.INFO: A jump, run, and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help NightStalker find coins and Molotov cocktails to fight against the giant Skull Warrior.

DABUBBLE.INFO: This app is a Slack clone. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

DENISDUDDA.TESTI: It was a pleasure working with you. Your calm and composed manner, as well as your quick grasp of new concepts, have greatly enriched our projects. I truly appreciate your professionalism and look forward to future collaborations.

KAISCHULZ.TESTI: Working with Mehmet Deliaci was a real asset. He impressed with his technical expertise, structured approach, and strong commitment. Mehmet always thought in a solution-oriented way and motivated the team. I would happily work with him again anytime.

SARAHMUELLER.TESTI: Working with Mehmet Deliaci was always inspiring. His ability to stay focused even in stressful situations and his attention to detail elevated our project to the next level. Mehmet has the skill to creatively solve technical challenges while keeping the bigger picture in mind. He is a true asset to any team.

JONASWEBER.TESTI: Mehmet Deliaci stands out for his exceptional work ethic and his ability to handle even the most challenging tasks with ease. He always goes the extra mile to deliver high-quality results. His communication skills and team spirit make him an ideal colleague, and I would gladly work with him again.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's Work Together
CONTACT.TEXT: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, learning about your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.

FORM.NAME: What's your name?
FORM.HELP_PLACEHOLDER: Hello Mehmet, I am interested in ...
FORM.PRIVACY3: and agree to the processing of my data in accordance with the guidelines.

IMPRINT.NAME: Mehmet Deliaci
IMPRINT.RESPONSIBILITY_TITLE: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
IMPRINT.CONTENT_LIABILITY_TEXT1: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages in accordance with general laws according to § 7 Abs.1 TMG. However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obliged as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored external information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
IMPRINT.CONTENT_LIABILITY_TEXT2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. Upon becoming aware of any violations, I will immediately remove such content.
IMPRINT.LINKS_LIABILITY_TEXT1: My offer contains links to external third-party websites, the contents of which I have no influence on. Therefore, I cannot accept any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the contents of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking.
IMPRINT.LINKS_LIABILITY_TEXT2: A permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. Upon becoming aware of any violations, I will immediately remove such links.
IMPRINT.COPYRIGHT_TEXT1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The duplication, editing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
IMPRINT.COPYRIGHT_TEXT2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of any violations, I will immediately remove such content.

PRIVACY.NAME: Mehmet Deliaci
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTION_TITLE: 2. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTION_TEXT: When you send a message via the contact form, the following data will be processed:
PRIVACY.DATA_USAGE_TEXT: These data will be used exclusively to process your request. They will not be shared with third parties.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: The processing of your data is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR (consent) and Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (fulfillment of a contract or pre-contractual measures).
PRIVACY.STORAGE_DURATION_TEXT: Your data will be stored as long as it is necessary to process your request. After completion of the request, your data will be deleted unless there are legal retention obligations.
PRIVACY.YOUR_RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
PRIVACY.RIGHT_ACCESS: Access to your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_CONTACT_TEXT: To exercise your rights, you can contact the above email address.
PRIVACY.CONSENT_TEXT: By sending a message via the contact form, you agree to the processing of your data in accordance with this privacy policy.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: I reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy in line with changes in the legal situation or data processing.
